Attacks.Name: Paradox Pulsar
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, this character gains 1 power. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Shocked special condition and is pushed S.

Attacks.Name: Sandstorm Burst
Attacks.Effect: Characters damaged by this attack gain the Slow special condition. Allied characters within the area do not suffer damage.

Attacks.Name: Magnetic Spike Storm
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, choose a terrain feature of size 3 or less within range 3. Remove it from the battlefield. Enemy characters within range 2 of the removed terrain suffer 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Protosynthesis
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 3 or more power, add 1 die to its attack and defense rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Electro Drift
Superpowers.Effect: This character advances M. During this advance it does not suffer damage from terrain or collision effects and may move through other characters.

Attacks.Name: Terra Surge
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target character gains the Rooted special condition. If the target already had Rooted, it instead suffers 1 additional damage.

Superpowers.Name: Magnet Rise
Superpowers.Effect: For the rest of the round, this character gains Flight, reduces collision damage suffered by 1, and may re-roll one die in each defense roll.

Superpowers.Name: Temporal Feedback
Superpowers.Effect: When an enemy character within range 2 suffers damage from a special condition, this character gains 1 power.
